jobSeekers.title: For Job seekers
jobSeekers.description: To apply for a job, please send you full CV to hr@shaleem.co
jobSeekers.info: our CV shall contain the following information
jobSeekers.help1: 1. A written CV in the English language
jobSeekers.help2: 2. Certificates from your school, college or university
jobSeekers.help4: 4. A copy of your drivers licence (if available)
jobSeekers.help5: 5. A copy of your ID Card

forSuppliers.title: For suppliers
forSuppliers.description: To provide us information about your products please send the following documents to info@shaleem.co
forSuppliers.help1: 1. Evidence of company registration in the Sultanate of Oman.
